casebody.data:
No. 09-724. The Real Truth About Obama, Inc., Petitioner v. Federal Election Commission, et al. 559 U.S. 1089, 130 S. Ct. 2371,

176 L. Ed. 2d 764,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3521. April 26, 2010.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit for further consideration in light of Citizens United v. Federal Election Comm’n, 558 U.S. 310, 130 S. Ct. 876, 175 L. Ed. 2d 753 (2010), and the Solicitor General’s suggestion of mootness.

Same case below, 575 F.3d 342.
